summary: A group of friends, just looking to have a good time in a rave party on a remote island in Goa, find out that the island is infested with Zombies.
cast: Saif Ali Khan|Kunal Khemu|Vir Das|Anand Tiwari|Puja Gupta|Hardik Malaviya|Rahul Jaiswal|Soha Ali Khan|Chacha Mogambo|Pitobash|Suparn Verma
title: Go Goa Gone
